item.title: Location of UK green SMEs
item.description: BEIS Logitudinal Small Business Survey 2021 The latest wave of the survey of SMEs by the UK Department for Business Energy and Industrial Strategy has 3 years of data on green small businesses. The data show the location of green SMEs in all the nations of the UK and by postcode. The code to obtain a map of these locations is generated using the maps and ggplot libraries. RColorBrewer adds cool palettes:

item.title: Hello R Markdown Modified
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. I’ve changed the original file You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
